String.Source: ああ、そうするのもいいかもしれない
String.Dest: Sounds good.

String.Dest: I'm not in the mood for that right now.

String.Source: ・・・ちょっと場所を移そうか
String.Dest: ...Let's go somewhere else.

String.Source: いや、やっぱりここじゃなくて・・・
String.Dest: No, not here after all...

String.Source: ちょうどそう思っていたところだ（友好度上昇）
String.Dest: I was just thinking that. (Friendship Up)

String.Source: 面白くもない冗談だ（友好度下降）
String.Dest: That's not even funny. (Friendship Down)

String.Source: 同じ絆を持つ者同士のみが、愛溢れるときを過ごすことができる
String.Dest: Those who hold the same bond can spend their time filled with love.

String.Source: 同じ絆を持つ者同士のみが、愛溢れるときを過ごすことができる
String.Dest: Those who hold the same bond can spend their time filled with love.

String.Source: 家族の証を所持している者は、性交につながる声掛けは行わない
String.Dest: Those who own a Proof of Family will not approach others for sexual intercourse.

String.Source: 婚約の証を所持している者は、「あなた」以外に対して、性交につながる声掛けは行わない
String.Dest: Those who hold a Proof of a Bethrothal will only approach you for sexual intercourse.

String.Source: 同じ絆を持つ者同士のみが、愛溢れるときを過ごすことができる
String.Dest: Those who hold the same bond can spend their time filled with love.

String.Source: 獣の心を持つ者は、相手の状態にかかわらず、たとえ断られても自らの欲求を押し通す
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of a Beast will seek to fulfill their desires, even if they are rejected.

String.Source: 性奴隷の心を持つ者は、自らの状態にかかわらず、すべての人からの要求を受け入れる
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of a Slave will seek to fulfill the desires of all people, no matter their own situation.

String.Source: 奉仕の心を持つ者は、自らの状態にかかわらず、すべての人からの要求を受け入れる
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of Service will seek to fulfill the desires of all people, no matter their own situation.

String.Source: 恥じらいの心を持つ者は、その内心を告げることができず、ただ待つことしかできない
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of Bashfulness will be forced to wait, unable to act upon their own desires.

String.Source: 博愛の心を持つ者は、絆を持つ者だけではなく、すべての人に愛を与え、また愛を与えられる
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of Benevolence can exchange love freely with others, irregardless of Bonds.

String.Source: 人見知りの心を持つ者は、仲間にしか自分を打ち明けられず、仲間しか受け入れない
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of Shyness will only open up to their companions, and accept only them.

String.Source: 両性愛の心を持つ者同士は、たとえ同性であっても声を掛け合い、愛を育む。「あなた」が両性愛の心を持つ場合、同性の者もその心を満たすために声を掛けるだろう
String.Dest: Those who hold the Heart of Bisexuality will interact with each other irregardless of gender. Should you hold the Heart, both genders will approach you for love.

String.Source: 約束の証を所持している者は、性交につながる声掛けは行わない。ただし、「絆」を持つ者同士は例外である
String.Dest: Those who own the Proof of a Promise will not approach others for sexual intercourse. Those who hold the same Bond are exempt from this, however.

String.Source: 同性愛の心を持つ「あなた」は、同性の者からのみ声を掛けられるだろう。
String.Dest: Shoud you hold the Heart of Homosexuality, then only those of your gender will approach you.

String.Source: 同じ絆を持つ者同士のみが、愛溢れるときを過ごすことができる
String.Dest: Those who hold the same bond can spend their time filled with love.

String.Source: 同じ絆を持つ者同士のみが、愛溢れるときを過ごすことができる
String.Dest: Those who hold the same bond can spend their time filled with love.

String.Source: お互い、疲れすぎているように思えます。よろしければ、少しリラックスを・・・
String.Dest: We both seem pretty tired. Allow me to help you relax...

String.Source: 従士様、その・・・愚かな私に、あなたの慈悲を頂きたく・・・
String.Dest: I beg you, Thane... bestow your benevolence upon me...

String.Source: お辛いご様子で・・・私に何かできることはありますか？
String.Dest: You seem to be in pain... Is there something I can do for you?

String.Source: その・・・少し休んでもいいのではありませんか？
String.Dest: Shall... Shall we rest for a little time?

String.Source: 我々は一刻も早く交わるべきだ。カジートはそう思う
String.Dest: Khajit believes that we should lie with each other as fast as possible.

String.Source: カジートは愛を欲している。助けてはくれないか？
String.Dest: Khajit is in need of love. Will you not help this one?

String.Source: 大丈夫か？楽しみを我慢する必要はない。カジートが助けになろう
String.Dest: Are you alright? You shouldn't deny pleasure. See, Khajiit will help you.

String.Source: 少し休憩するのもいいと思わないか？
String.Dest: Wouldn't a little break do us both good right now?

String.Source: なあ、もう我慢できないんだが・・・お互いに、そうなんじゃないか？
String.Dest: I can't hold myself back anymore... but that's true for both of us, isn't it?

String.Source: なあ、もう我慢できないんだが・・・
String.Dest: You know, I can't hold back anymore...

String.Source: その・・・随分と辛そうに見える。自分で役に立てるか？
String.Dest: You don't look too good. Can I be of use to you somehow?

String.Source: 少し、その・・・休憩してもいいと思わないか？
String.Dest: Shouldn't you, you know... take a break?

String.Source: その・・・我慢するのはよくはない。言っている意味はわかるだろう？
String.Dest: It's not good to hold back, you know. You understand what I want to say, don't you?

String.Source: なあ・・・その、身体が熱いんだが・・・
String.Dest: You know, my body is burning up right now...

String.Source: 随分と辛そうに見えるな。自分にできることなら、何でも言ってくれ
String.Dest: You seem pretty uncomfortable. If there's anything I can do, just tell me.

String.Source: よければ、少し休憩をしないか？
String.Dest: We can take a little break, if you'd like?

String.Source: どうやらあてられてしまったようだ。したいことは一緒じゃないか？
String.Dest: Looks like I've been affected as well. But now we want the same, don't we?

String.Source: 随分と身体が火照ってるんだ。よかったら鎮めてくれないか？
String.Dest: My body feels like it's burning up. Will you help me quell it?

String.Source: 自分を誘っているのか？まあ、相手をしてもいいが・・・
String.Dest: Is that an invitation? I suppose I might as well...

String.Source: ちょっと休憩してもいいんじゃないか？
String.Dest: Don't you think you deserve a break?

String.Source: 身体が熱くて爆発してしまいそうだ・・・そうだろう？
String.Dest: Your body is so hot, you feel you're about to melt... am I right?

String.Source: ふう・・・身体が熱くてたまらない。どうにかしてくれないか？
String.Dest: Phew... my body is feeling unbearably hot. Can't you do something about that?

String.Source: 男に向かってそんな目をするんじゃない、危ないぞ。・・・自分に何かできるか？
String.Dest: You shouldn't make those eyes at a man, that's dangerous... Can I do something for you?

String.Source: ちょっと休憩がてら、軽い運動でもどうだ？
String.Dest: How would you like some light exercise?

String.Source: なあ、もう我慢できないんだが・・・お互いに、そうなんじゃないか？
String.Dest: I can't hold myself back anymore... but that's true for both of us, isn't it?

String.Source: なあ、もう我慢できないんだが・・・
String.Dest: You know, I can't hold back anymore...

String.Source: その・・・随分と辛そうに見える。自分で役に立てるか？
String.Dest: You don't look too good. Can I be of use to you somehow?

String.Source: 少し、その・・・休憩してもいいと思わないか？
String.Dest: Shouldn't you, you know... take a break?

String.Source: あの・・・その、より深い信頼関係のためにも・・・
String.Dest: I believe, we should... deepen our relationship...

String.Source: 従士様、その・・・あなたの寵愛を・・・
String.Dest: Thane, I, uh, ask for your favour...

String.Source: 随分と苦しそうに見えますが、その・・・よければ私をお使いください
String.Dest: You seem to be in quite some pain. Um... you can use me, if it pleases you.

String.Source: 少し休んでもいいのではありませんか？
String.Dest: Shouldn't you take a small break now?

String.Source: ねえ、もう我慢できないの・・・あなたもそうでしょ？
String.Dest: I can't bear it anymore... can you?

String.Source: ねえ、もう我慢できないの・・・
String.Dest: I can't bear it anymore...

String.Source: ねえ、随分と辛そうよ。よかったら、私が・・・
String.Dest: That looks pretty painful. If you'd like, I can help you with that...

String.Source: ねえ、ちょっと休憩してもいいと思わない？
String.Dest: Say, shouldn't you better take a break?

String.Source: 私たち、随分と相性がいいのかも。あなたも・・・でしょう？
String.Dest: You and I might be pretty compatible. You think so too... don't you?

String.Source: ねえ、身体が熱いの・・・
String.Dest: My body is so hot...

String.Source: ねえ、その・・・大丈夫？私にできることなら、何でも言ってね。
String.Dest: Do you feel alright? If there's anything I can do for you, just say it.

String.Source: その・・・良かったら少し休憩しない？
String.Dest: Would you like to,um... take a break with me?

String.Source: ところかまわず発情しているあなたに、私もあてられたようです。
String.Dest: It seems your rutting has affected me as well.

String.Source: ・・・動物だって発情期の雌は見分けるそうです。あなたは動物以下ですか。
String.Dest: ... Even beasts can distinguish females in heat. Can't you do even that?

String.Source: そんな目で見られると迷惑です。・・・特別に、楽にしてあげましょうか？
String.Dest: Your lustful stare bothers me... Just this once, shall I ease your pain?

String.Source: ちょっと・・・少し休憩しませんか？
String.Dest: Hey... would you like to take a break?

String.Source: ふふ、身体が熱いわ・・・あなたもそうなんでしょう？
String.Dest: Fufu, my body is burning up... aren't you as well?

String.Source: ねえ、身体が熱くてたまらないの・・・
String.Dest: My body is so unbearably hot right now...

String.Source: 獣みたいな顔をしてるわよ。何なら、私がお相手しましょうか？
String.Dest: You have the expression of a lusting beast. Shall I be your companion for now?

String.Source: ちょっと休憩がてら、軽い運動でもどう？
String.Dest: What do you think of a bit of exercise?

String.Source: その・・・身体が火照っていますの。あなたもそうでしょう？そうですわね？
String.Dest: My body, it's burning up... you feel it as well... don't you?

String.Source: その・・・身体が火照って・・・
String.Dest: My, um, body... it's burning up...

String.Source: 随分と気分が悪そうに見えますわ。その・・・よろしければ私が・・・
String.Dest: You seem to be in a bad mood. If.. if you'd like, I could help you...

String.Source: 少し休憩しませんこと？リラックスすることも、時には必要ですわ
String.Dest: Wouldn't you like to take a break? Relaxing is important too at times.

String.Source: ねえ、もう我慢できないの・・・あなたもそうでしょ？
String.Dest: I can't bear it anymore... can you?

String.Source: ねえ、もう我慢できないの・・・
String.Dest: I can't bear it anymore...

String.Source: ねえ、随分と辛そうよ。よかったら、私が・・・
String.Dest: That looks pretty painful. If you'd like, I can help you with that...

String.Source: ねえ、ちょっと休憩してもいいと思わない？
String.Dest: Say, shouldn't you better take a break?

String.Source: (...がすり寄ってきた。どうやら発情しているようだ)
String.Dest: (... came up to me. They seem excited.)

String.Source: (...がすり寄ってきた。どうやら発情しているようだ)
String.Dest: (... seems to clash, apparently estrus)

String.Source: あなたにお仕えできること、光栄です
String.Dest: It's an honor to be of service to you.

String.Source: 任せてください。私がすぐに楽にして差し上げます・・・
String.Dest: Leave it to me. I will give you comfort soon...

String.Source: あなたのお役に立てること、嬉しく思います
String.Dest: I'm happy to be of use to you.

String.Source: いつでもお声がけください
String.Dest: Please, come back anytime.

String.Source: 私兵への寛大なる処遇に、感謝いたします
String.Dest: Deep thanks for your generosity towards your troops.

String.Source: ・・・とても優しい方だ、あなたは・・・
String.Dest: ...You're so kind...

String.Source: ああ、素晴らしい考えだ！一緒に人生を楽しもう
String.Dest: An excellent idea! Let us enjoy life together!

String.Source: それでいい。我慢するには人生は短すぎる
String.Dest: Very good. Life is too short for you to restrain yourself.

String.Source: 任せてくれ。我慢なんてことは人生には必要ないことだ
String.Dest: Leave it to me. I've no need for restraint in my life.

String.Source: カジートでよければ、いつだって付き合うぞ
String.Dest: Khajit is happy to oblige you.

String.Source: ああ、素晴らしき友に乾杯だ
String.Dest: Cheers to you, my wonderful friend!

String.Source: その言葉をカジートは待っていた
String.Dest: Khajit has waited for these words.

String.Source: ああ、一緒に楽しもう
String.Dest: Yes, let's enjoy each other.

String.Source: ああ、やっぱり。ふふ、すぐ楽にしてやるよ
String.Dest: I thought so. Fufu, I'll put you at ease soon enough...

String.Source: ありがとう、光栄だね
String.Dest: Thank you. It's an honor.

String.Source: 自分でよければ、いつでも付き合うよ
String.Dest: I'm always ready, should you be fine with me.

String.Source: そう言ってくれると助かるよ。一緒に楽しもう
String.Dest: It's good to hear you say that. Let's enjoy each other.

String.Source: そうだろう？じゃぁ、早速・・・
String.Dest: Right? I'll go right ahead, then...

String.Source: ああ、一緒に楽しもう
String.Dest: Yes, let's enjoy each other.

String.Source: そうだと思ったよ。すぐに楽になる・・・
String.Dest: I thought you'd say so. I'll make you very happy...

String.Source: ああ、すべて任せろ。大丈夫だ
String.Dest: No problem. Leave everything to me.

String.Source: ああ、いつでも相談してくれて構わないぞ
String.Dest: Sure, you can ask anything at any time.

String.Source: 悪くない考えだろう？
String.Dest: Not a bad idea, is it?

String.Source: 同じ考えで嬉しいよ。さあ、はじめよう
String.Dest: I'm glad we thought the same. Now, let's begin.

String.Source: そう言ってくれると思っていたよ
String.Dest: I thought you'd say that.

String.Source: そうだ、我慢するのは身体によくない
String.Dest: Exactly. Holding back is bad for your body.

String.Source: ああ、全て任せればいい
String.Dest: Yeah, you can leave everything to me.

String.Source: 自分でよければ、いつでも声をかけてくれ
String.Dest: As long as you're fine with me, anytime.

String.Source: そうだろう、そうだろう。わかっていたさ
String.Dest: Right? Right? I knew you'd agree.

String.Source: ほう、どうするのがいいんだ？・・・冗談だよ
String.Dest: Now, what should I do... Just kidding.

String.Source: 一緒にいられる奴がいるっていうのもいいものだ
String.Dest: No a bad thing, to have someone sticking with you.

String.Source: 我慢は良くないな。すぐ楽にしてやる
String.Dest: It's no good to just hold out. I'll put you at ease soon.

String.Source: おう、任せておけ
String.Dest: Sure, leave it to me.

String.Source: 良い顔をしてるよ。吸い込まれちまいそうだ
String.Dest: I like that expression. Feels like I'm getting sucked right in.

String.Source: 話が早い奴は嫌いじゃない。さあ、はじめよう
String.Dest: Good, I like quick thinkers. Now, let's begin.

String.Source: そうだろう？そう言ってくれると思っていたよ
String.Dest: Right? I thought you'd say so.

String.Source: ああ、一緒に楽しもう
String.Dest: Yes, let's enjoy each other.

String.Source: ああ、やっぱり。ふふ、すぐ楽にしてやるよ
String.Dest: I thought so. Fufu, I'll put you at ease soon enough...

String.Source: ありがとう、光栄だね
String.Dest: Thank you. It's an honor.

String.Source: 自分でよければ、いつでも付き合うよ
String.Dest: I'm always ready, should you be fine with me.

String.Source: そう言ってくれると助かるよ。一緒に楽しもう
String.Dest: It's good to hear you say that. Let's enjoy each other.

String.Source: そうだろう？じゃぁ、早速・・・
String.Dest: Right? I'll go right ahead, then...

String.Source: 光栄です。喜んでお相手いたします
String.Dest: I'm honored to be your companion.

String.Source: はい、遠慮なさらないでください
String.Dest: Please, there's no need for restraint.

String.Source: お役に立てて光栄です、従士様
String.Dest: I'm honored to serve you, Thane.

String.Source: いつでも私をお使いください
String.Dest: Please make use of me anytime you want.

String.Source: ああ、ありがとうございます。優しいのですね・・・
String.Dest: Thank you very much. How kind of you...

String.Source: はい、喜んでお相手いたします
String.Dest: Yes, with pleasure.

String.Source: 良かった。一緒に楽しみましょ
String.Dest: I'm so glad. Let's enjoy ourselves then.

String.Source: やっぱりね、そうだと思ってた
String.Dest: I knew you'd agree.

String.Source: ふふ、任せて
String.Dest: Fufu, leave it to me.

String.Source: もう、遠慮せず言ってくれたらいいのに
String.Dest: Oh, you could've said so sooner, you know?

String.Source: ああ、良かった。一緒に楽しみましょう
String.Dest: I'm glad to hear that. Let's have fun then.

String.Source: そうでしょ？ ね、はやくしましょう
String.Dest: I know, right? Let's do it quickly, now.

String.Source: ふふ・・・あなたと一緒にいられて嬉しいわ
String.Dest: Fufu... I'm so happy to be with you.

String.Source: やっぱりね、そうだと思っていたわ
String.Dest: I thought you'd say so.

String.Source: 私に任せて。楽にしてあげる
String.Dest: Leave it to me. I'll give you comfort.

String.Source: ふふ、いつでもそう言ってくれていいのよ
String.Dest: Fufu, you can say so any time you want.

String.Source: 悪くない考えでしょう？ふふ・・・
String.Dest: Not a bad idea, is it? Fufu...

String.Source: 同意が得られてなによりよ。さあ、きて・・・
String.Dest: I'm glad we agree. Now, come here...

String.Source: そうだろうと思っていました
String.Dest: I thought as much.

String.Source: 物わかりのいい人は嫌いじゃありません
String.Dest: I like people who are quick on the uptake.

String.Source: 素直になればいいんです
String.Dest: You should just be honest to yourself.

String.Source: あなたにそうしてくれる人なんて、私くらいでしょうしね
String.Dest: I'm probably the only one who'd do this for you.

String.Source: まあ、たまには悪くないかもしれませんね
String.Dest: I suppose this isn't bad once in a while.

String.Source: どうするのも？まあ、あなたの考えなんてひとつでしょうけど
String.Dest: What would you like to do? Well, you're obviously thinking of just one thing.

String.Source: ふふ、一緒に楽しみましょう
String.Dest: Fufu, let's have fun together.

String.Source: そうでしょう？ 我慢はよくないわ
String.Dest: Isn't it just? You shouldn't hold back.

String.Source: 好きなように私の中に吐き出していいわよ
String.Dest: You can come inside me as much as you want.

String.Source: ああ、良い顔ね・・・求められるのは、悪くないわ
String.Dest: I like that expression... being sought after isn't bad at all.

String.Source: ああ、もう我慢できないわ。ねえ、激しくてね
String.Dest: Yes, I can't hold back anymore. I beg you, take me hard.

String.Source: さすがね、さあ、はじめましょう
String.Dest: As expected. Now, let's begin.

String.Source: 楽しむことは悪いことではありませんわ
String.Dest: Enjoying yourself is not a bad thing.

String.Source: そうおっしゃると思いましたわ
String.Dest: My, I just knew you'd say so.

String.Source: 溜まっているもの、すべて私が吸い出してさしあげます
String.Dest: I'll suck out everything you've saved up until now.

String.Source: 私の身体でよろしければ、存分に使ってくだい
String.Dest: Use my body to your content, if it pleases you.

String.Source: この火照りを鎮められるなら、何をしても構いません
String.Dest: I'll do anything to calm this burning inside me.

String.Source: そういうことではないんですけれども・・・まあ、あなたがそうおっしゃるなら・・・
String.Dest: That wasn't my intention... but I you say so...

String.Source: 良かった。一緒に楽しみましょ
String.Dest: I'm so glad. Let's enjoy ourselves then.

String.Source: やっぱりね、そうだと思ってた
String.Dest: I knew you'd agree.

String.Source: ふふ、任せて
String.Dest: Fufu, leave it to me.

String.Source: もう、遠慮せず言ってくれたらいいのに
String.Dest: Oh, you could've said so sooner, you know?

String.Source: ああ、良かった。一緒に楽しみましょう
String.Dest: I'm glad to hear that. Let's have fun then.

String.Source: そうでしょ？ね、はやくしましょう
String.Dest: Right? Now, let's hurry.

String.Source: (...は興奮し、ますます身体をすりよせてきた)
String.Dest: (...grows agitated, and nestles even closer)

String.Source: 失礼を致しました。従士
String.Dest: Excuse my rudeness then, Thane.

String.Source: かしこまりました
String.Dest: I understand

String.Source: そうか？お前がそんな気分でいるのをカジートは悲しく思う
String.Dest: Khajiit is very sad you feel that way.

String.Source: 元気を出せ、友よ。人生は短い。精一杯、楽しむんだ
String.Dest: Cheer up, my friend. Life is short. Enjoy it to the fullest.

String.Source: そうか・・・それは残念だ
String.Dest: I see... that's a shame.

String.Source: そうか？まあ、気が変わったら声をかけてくれ
String.Dest: Indeed? Well, call for me if you change your mind.

String.Source: わかった。まあ、仕方ないな
String.Dest: I get it. Well, can't help it then.

String.Source: そうか・・・良かったら、また声をかけてくれ
String.Dest: I see... Come back if you'd like.

String.Source: それじゃぁ、仕方ないな
String.Dest: Can't be helped then.

String.Source: そうか・・・残念だ
String.Dest: I see... what a shame.

String.Source: わかった。その気になったら言ってくれよ
String.Dest: I understand. Tell me should your mood change.

String.Source: そうか、それは残念だな
String.Dest: I see, that's too bad.

String.Source: そうか・・・それは残念だ
String.Dest: I see... that's a shame.

String.Source: そうか？まあ、気が変わったら声をかけてくれ
String.Dest: Indeed? Well, call for me if you change your mind.

String.Source: そうですか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうですか。我慢なさらないでくださいね
String.Dest: I see. Please, don't restrain yourself.
Oh, I see...

String.Source: そう、せっかく・・・残念
String.Dest: I see, and I'd thought... too bad.

String.Source: そう・・・仕方ないわね
String.Dest: Really... that's too bad, then.

String.Source: そう、せっかく・・・良かったら、また声をかけてね
String.Dest: I see, here I thought... if you'd like, let's talk again.

String.Source: ああ、そうですか
String.Dest: Oh, I see.

String.Source: そうですか、せっかく・・・いえ、なんでも
String.Dest: I see, and I thought I'd finally... no, never mind.

String.Source: そう？
String.Dest: Oh?

String.Source: あら、そう・・・
String.Dest: My, I see...

String.Source: それは失礼をいたしましたわね
String.Dest: That was rude of me then.

String.Source: そうですか、せっかく・・・いえ、なんでもありませんわ
String.Dest: I see, I'd thought finally... no, it's nothing.
Oh, I see...

String.Source: そう、せっかく・・・残念
String.Dest: I see, and I'd thought... too bad.

String.Source: (...は悲しそうな表情を見せ、うなだれた)
String.Dest: (... shows a sad expression and hangs its head

String.Source: その言葉には、従えないようです！
String.Dest: I cannot obey you in that!

String.Source: 申し訳ありません！もう、我慢ができないのです！
String.Dest: Forgive me, but I can't bear it anymore!

String.Source: そんなことを言わないでくれ！カジートはもう我慢できない！
String.Dest: Don't say that! This one can't hold back anymore!

String.Source: なぜそんなことを言う！？したいときにできない人生など、願い下げだ！
String.Dest: How can you say that?! I'm going to do what I want, whenever I want it!

String.Source: そんなこと言うなよ！もう我慢できないんだ！
String.Dest: Don't say that! I can't hold back anymore!

String.Source: すまないが、もう我慢ができないんだ！
String.Dest: Sorry, but I can't restrain myself anymore!

String.Source: そう言わないでくれ、もう我慢ができないんだ！
String.Dest: Please don't say that! I can't hold back anymore!

String.Source: すまないが、我慢できそうもない・・・！
String.Dest: Sorry, but I don't think I can restrain myself...!

String.Source: そうか・・・残念だ。まあ、無理やりっていうのも嫌いじゃない！
String.Dest: I see... that's a shame. Well, I don't mind raping you either!

String.Source: そう言われて我慢できる状態じゃないんだ！
String.Dest: I'm not in a state where that's enough to calm me down!

String.Source: おいおいつれないこと言うなよ！なあ！
String.Dest: Woah, woah, don't be so heartless!

String.Source: 悪いがもう止められないんだよ！
String.Dest: Sorry, but I can't stop now!

String.Source: そんなこと言うなよ！なあ！もう我慢できないんだ！
String.Dest: Come on, don't be like that! I can't hold myself back anymore!

String.Source: すまないが、もう我慢ができないんだ！
String.Dest: Sorry, but I can't restrain myself anymore!

String.Source: そういわれても、私も我慢できないんです！
String.Dest: You can say what you want, but I can't hold myself back any longer!

String.Source: 申し訳ありません！もう、我慢ができないのです！
String.Dest: Forgive me, but I can't bear it anymore!

String.Source: そんなこと言わないで！もう我慢できないの！
String.Dest: Please, don't say that! I can't hold myself back anymore!

String.Source: ごめんなさい、もう我慢できないの！
String.Dest: I'm sorry, but I can't restrain myself anymore!

String.Source: そんなこと言わないで！もう我慢できないの！
String.Dest: Please, don't say that! I can't hold myself back anymore!

String.Source: ごめんなさい、もう我慢できないの！
String.Dest: I'm sorry, but I can't restrain myself anymore!

String.Source: そういわれても、私も我慢できないんです！
String.Dest: You can say what you want, but I can't hold myself back any longer!

String.Source: あなたの意見は聞いていません！
String.Dest: I didn't ask for your opinion!

String.Source: そんなこと言われても、私の身体は止まらないのよ！
String.Dest: Even if you say that, my body won't stop now!

String.Source: ああ、ダメなのよ。もう疼きが止まらないの・・・！
String.Dest: Aah, it's too late... I can't stop this aching...!

String.Source: そんなことをおっしゃらないで！もう許してください！
String.Dest: I beg you, don't say that! Forgive me!

String.Source: ああ、ダメなんです！私の身体があなたを欲していますの！
String.Dest: Aah, it's no good! My body longs for you!

String.Source: そんなこと言わないで！もう我慢できないの！
String.Dest: Please, don't say that! I can't hold myself back anymore!

String.Source: ごめんなさい、もう我慢できないの！
String.Dest: I'm sorry, but I can't restrain myself anymore!

String.Source: (...はあなたの静止もきかず、とびかかってきた！)
String.Dest: (... ignores your warnings and lunges at you!)

String.Source: わかりました。ついていきます
String.Dest: I understand. I'll follow you.

String.Source: わかりました。では、どちらへ？
String.Dest: I understand. Where are we going?

String.Source: わかった。どこがいい？
String.Dest: Got it. Where do you want to go?

String.Source: わかった。どこに行く？
String.Dest: Got it. Where are you going?

String.Source: (...は嬉しそうにしている。ついてくるようだ)
String.Dest: (... looks happy. They will apparently follow you.)

String.Source: ここでなら、よろしいのですか？
String.Dest: Does this place seem acceptable to you?

String.Source: ここでするのがお望みですか？
String.Dest: Is this where you wish to do it?

String.Source: ここでしたいのか？
String.Dest: Do you want to do it here?

String.Source: ここでするの？
String.Dest: Are we doing it here?

String.Source: (...はあなたの様子をうかがっている)
String.Dest: (... is watching your reaction.)

String.Source: その言葉が何よりの栄誉です。従士
String.Dest: Your words honor me greatly, Thane.

String.Source: もったいないお言葉です、従士様・・・
String.Dest: Your words are wasted on me, my Thane.

String.Source: お前といると、カジートは心が温まるよ
String.Dest: Khajiit's heart is warmed by your presence.

String.Source: そう言ってくれると嬉しいね
String.Dest: I'm happy to hear you say that.

String.Source: 嬉しい。あなたのこと、もっと知りたいの・・・
String.Dest: Thank you. I'd like to get to know you better...

String.Source: 嬉しいね。きっと、もっとよくわかりあえる・・・
String.Dest: Thank you. I'm sure we'll get to know each other even more...

String.Source: 嬉しいわ。あなたのこと、もっと教えて・・・
String.Dest: How delightful. Please, tell me more about you...

String.Source: そうだろう？なんでもお見通しさ
String.Dest: I can see right through you, can't I?

String.Source: そうですか。まあ、そう言われて悪い気はしませんね
String.Dest: I see. Well, hearing that doesn't feel bad.

String.Source: そうか？いや、そう言われると悪い気分はしないな
String.Dest: Really? Well, hearing you say that doesn't feel bad at all.

String.Source: ふふ、素直な人は好きよ
String.Dest: Fufu, I like honest people.

String.Source: 誰にでもそう言っているのではなくて？ ・・・でも、悪い気はしませんわ
String.Dest: You're not just saying that to everybody, are you? ...Still, this doesn't feel bad.

String.Source: そう言ってくれると嬉しいね
String.Dest: I'm happy to hear you say that.

String.Source: 嬉しい。あなたのこと、もっと知りたいの・・・
String.Dest: Thank you. I'd like to get to know you better...

String.Source: (…は幸せそうにあなたのそばに寄り添ってきた)
String.Dest: (... happily snuggles up to you.)

String.Source: 少し頭を冷やしたほうがよろしいのでは？
String.Dest: Shouldn't you cool your head a bit?

String.Source: そのような言葉はお使いになりませんように
String.Dest: You mustn't talk like that.

String.Source: 忠告しておこう。カジートは夜目が利く。言っている意味は分かるな？
String.Dest: Khajit can see very well in the dark. You understand what this one is telling you, no?

String.Source: そうかいそうかい、後悔するんじゃないぞ
String.Dest: I see, I see... I hope you won't regret this.

String.Source: そんなことを言う人だって思ってなかったわ
String.Dest: I didn't think you to be the kind of person to say something like that.

String.Source: 声をかけた自分が馬鹿だった。そういうことだな
String.Dest: Is that so? I was a fool for even trying to talk to you.

String.Source: あなたに声をかけた私が馬鹿だったようね
String.Dest: It seems I was being foolish by trying to talk to you.

String.Source: そうかいそうかい、後悔するんじゃないぞ
String.Dest: I see, I see... I hope you won't regret this.

String.Source: ふん、どうぞご自由に
String.Dest: Humph, go ahead then.

String.Source: ふんっ、いつか後悔させてやるぞ
String.Dest: Humph. I'll make you regret this one day.

String.Source: あなたに声をかけた私が馬鹿だったようね
String.Dest: It seems I was being foolish by trying to talk to you.

String.Source: ふんっ、勝手になさって
String.Dest: Humph, do what you will.

String.Source: そうかいそうかい、後悔するんじゃないぞ
String.Dest: I see, I see... I hope you won't regret this.

String.Source: そんなことを言う人だって思ってなかったわ
String.Dest: I didn't think you to be the kind of person to say something like that.

String.Source: (...はあなたを見てうなり声をあげた)
String.Dest: (... looks at you and growls.)

String.Source: なるほど・・・では、従者として主人を教育するのも我が務めです！
String.Dest: I see... it seems the servant must educate the master then!

String.Source: 面白い！カジートにそんな言葉を浴びせて、どうなるかわからないのか！？
String.Dest: Interesting! Don't you realize what will happen if you insult this one?!

String.Source: 馬鹿にされるのは好きじゃないんだ。じゃぁ、無理やりしてやるよ！
String.Dest: I don't like being made a fool of. You know what, I'm just going to fuck you anyway!

String.Source: 男を馬鹿にするのなら、もっとよく考えるべきだったな！
String.Dest: You probably should've thought a bit harder about making a fool of a man!

String.Source: ふんっ、お高くとまりやがって！無理やりっていうのも嫌いじゃないがな！
String.Dest: Pah, don't put on airs! Raping you has its own charm, you know!

String.Source: 喧嘩を売っているのか？そんな態度を取ったことを後悔させてやろう！
String.Dest: Are you picking a fight with me? I'll make you regret that attitude!

String.Source: そうですか。では、私は従士としてふさわしくないあなたを教育してさしあげます！
String.Dest: Is that so? I'll have to teach you the propers manners of a Thane, then!

String.Source: 少し調子に乗りすぎじゃない？私がその鼻、へし折ってあげる！
String.Dest: You're getting a bit too carried away. I'll break that nose of yours!

String.Source: 女に恥をかかせて素通りするつもり？そんなこと許さない！
String.Dest: Did you think you could just walk on after shaming a woman? I won't let you!

String.Source: 礼儀を知らない人ですね。そんな野蛮人は私が躾けてあげます！
String.Dest: You're a barbarian who knows nothing of etiquette. I'll just have to teach you then!

String.Source: へえ、私に喧嘩を売っているのかしら？足腰立たなくしてあげるわ！
String.Dest: Oh, are you picking a fight with me? You won't be standing after this!

String.Source: 私をからかっているのですか？そういう態度を取る方にはお仕置きしてさしあげます！
String.Dest: Are you mocking me? I will have to chastise you, then!

String.Source: 馬鹿にされるのは好きじゃないんだ。じゃぁ、無理やりしてやるよ！
String.Dest: I don't like being made a fool of. You know what, I'm just going to fuck you anyway!

String.Source: 少し調子に乗りすぎじゃない？私がその鼻、へし折ってあげる！
String.Dest: You're getting a bit too carried away. I'll break that nose of yours!

String.Source: (...はあなたに向けてうなった後、静止もきかずとびかかってきた！)
String.Dest: (... growls and then jumps at you!)

String.Source: その・・・抱きしめてもよろしいですか？従士
String.Dest: May I, um, embrace you, Thane?

String.Source: 従士様、あなたの温もりを感じさせてほしいのです・・・
String.Dest: I would like to feel your heat on my skin, my Thane...

String.Source: ・・・抱きしめてもよろしいですか？従士様
String.Dest: ...May I embrace you, my Thane?

String.Source: 抱きしめあうことも時には必要だ、そうは思わないか？
String.Dest: This is just the right time for a hug. Don't you agree?

String.Source: なあ・・・抱きしめてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... can I hug you?

String.Source: ねえ・・・抱きしめてもいい？
String.Dest: Can I... hug you?

String.Source: ねえ、あなたのこと、抱きしめたくなっちゃった
String.Dest: I've just got this sudden desire to hug you.

String.Source: なあ・・・抱きしめてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... can I hug you?

String.Source: あなたの温もりを感じさせてくれる？
String.Dest: Will you let me feel the warmth of your skin?

String.Source: ねえ・・・抱きしめてもいい？
String.Dest: Can I... hug you?

String.Source: よかったら、抱きしめてあげてもいい。どうする？
String.Dest: I might just be persuaded to hug you. What do you say?

String.Source: その・・・抱きしめてもいいですか？
String.Dest: Could I... hug you?

String.Source: あなたのことを抱きしめたくなりました。いいですね？
String.Dest: I would like to hug you. That's fine, isn't it?

String.Source: なあ・・・もし嫌じゃなかったら、その、抱きしめてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... if you don't mind, would you let me hug you?

String.Source: あなたの温もりを感じさせてくれるかしら？
String.Dest: Would you let me feel your heat?

String.Source: ねえ・・・抱きしめてもいい？
String.Dest: Can I... hug you?

String.Source: その・・・私は体温が低いので・・・温めてくださいますか？
String.Dest: I, um... have a very low body temperature. Could you... heat me up?

String.Source: 人の温もりというものを感じさせてくれませんか？
String.Dest: Would you let me feel the warmth of another person?

String.Source: なあ・・・抱きしめてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... can I hug you?

String.Source: ねえ・・・抱きしめてもいい？
String.Dest: Can I... hug you?

String.Source: ねえ、あなたのこと、抱きしめたくなっちゃった
String.Dest: I've just got this sudden desire to hug you.

String.Source: ふふっ・・・
String.Dest: Fufu...

String.Source: 仰せの通りに
String.Dest: As you will.

String.Source: 申し訳ありません、従士
String.Dest: Forgive me then, Thane.

String.Source: ・・・わかりました
String.Dest: ...I understand.

String.Source: 申し訳ありません、従士
String.Dest: Forgive me then, Thane.

String.Source: そうか。そんな気分になったらいつでも声をかけてくれ
String.Dest: All right. Call out to me whenever you do feel like it.

String.Source: それは失礼をした。そういう時も確かにある
String.Dest: Certainly, we all have those moments. My apologies, then.

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: あ・・・ああ、すまなかった
String.Dest: Ah... I see. My bad.

String.Source: ご、ごめんなさい・・・
String.Dest: I... I'm sorry...

String.Source: そう・・・
String.Dest: Oh...

String.Source: まあ、そんな時もある
String.Dest: We all have those moments.

String.Source: そうか、すまなかったな
String.Dest: I see, my apologies then.

String.Source: ごめんなさい、邪魔するつもりはなかったの
String.Dest: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to bother you.

String.Source: そう、わかったわ
String.Dest: I understand.

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうか、気が変わったら言ってくれ
String.Dest: I see. Tell me should you change your mind.

String.Source: 気が回らない女ですいませんね
String.Dest: Well, sorry for being such a meddlesome woman.

String.Source: そうですか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: 悪かったな、気にしないでくれ
String.Dest: Sorry, never mind me then.

String.Source: そう、悪かったわね
String.Dest: I see. I'm sorry then.

String.Source: そう・・
String.Dest: Oh...

String.Source: それは失礼いたしました
String.Dest: My apologies then.

String.Source: そうですか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: あ・・・ああ、すまなかった
String.Dest: Ah... I see. My bad.

String.Source: ご、ごめんなさい・・・
String.Dest: I... I'm sorry...

String.Source: そう・・・
String.Dest: Oh...

String.Source: 従士・・・その、キスをしてもよろしいですか？
String.Dest: Thane... may I... may I kiss you?

String.Source: 従士様・・・キスしてもよろしいですか？
String.Dest: Thane... may I kiss you?

String.Source: 口付けは親愛の何よりの表現だ
String.Dest: There's no greater expression of love than a kiss.

String.Source: なあ・・・キスしてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... can I kiss you?

String.Source: ねえ・・・キスしてもいい？
String.Dest: Say... can I kiss you?

String.Source: なあ・・・キスしてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... can I kiss you?

String.Source: ねえ・・・キスしてもいいかしら？
String.Dest: Say... may I kiss you?

String.Source: キスしたいなら、してくれてもいい。こっちは準備できている
String.Dest: You can kiss me if you want. I'm ready for it.

String.Source: キスしたかったら、してもいいですよ？
String.Dest: If you want to kiss me, you can go ahead, you know?

String.Source: ああ、その・・・なんだ、キスをしてもいいか？
String.Dest: Can I, uh... can I kiss you?

String.Source: ねえ・・・キスしてもいいかしら？
String.Dest: Say... may I kiss you?

String.Source: その・・・キスをしてもよろしくって？
String.Dest: May I... kiss you?

String.Source: なあ・・・キスしてもいいか？
String.Dest: Hey... can I kiss you?

String.Source: ねえ・・・キスしてもいい？
String.Dest: Say... can I kiss you?

String.Source: ふふっ・・・
String.Dest: Fufu...

String.Source: 仰せの通りに
String.Dest: As you will.

String.Source: 申し訳ありません、従士
String.Dest: Forgive me then, Thane.

String.Source: ・・・わかりました
String.Dest: ...I understand.

String.Source: 申し訳ありません、従士
String.Dest: Forgive me then, Thane.

String.Source: そうか。そんな気分になったらいつでも声をかけてくれ
String.Dest: All right. Call out to me whenever you do feel like it.

String.Source: それは失礼をした。そういう時も確かにある
String.Dest: Certainly, we all have those moments. My apologies, then.

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: あ・・・ああ、すまなかった
String.Dest: Ah... I see. My bad.

String.Source: ご、ごめんなさい・・・
String.Dest: I... I'm sorry...

String.Source: そう・・・
String.Dest: Oh...

String.Source: まあ、そんな時もある
String.Dest: We all have those moments.

String.Source: そうか、すまなかったな
String.Dest: I see, my apologies then.

String.Source: ごめんなさい、邪魔するつもりはなかったの
String.Dest: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to bother you.

String.Source: そう、わかったわ
String.Dest: I understand.

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうか、気が変わったら言ってくれ
String.Dest: I see. Tell me should you change your mind.

String.Source: 気が回らない女ですいませんね
String.Dest: Well, sorry for being such a meddlesome woman.

String.Source: そうですか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: 悪かったな、気にしないでくれ
String.Dest: Sorry, never mind me then.

String.Source: そう、悪かったわね
String.Dest: I see. I'm sorry then.

String.Source: そう・・
String.Dest: Oh...

String.Source: それは失礼をいたしました
String.Dest: How rude of me then.

String.Source: そうですか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: そうか・・・
String.Dest: I see...

String.Source: あ・・・ああ、すまなかった
String.Dest: Ah... I see. My bad.

String.Source: ご、ごめんなさい・・・
String.Dest: I... I'm sorry...

String.Source: そう・・・
String.Dest: Oh...

String.Source: 仰せの通りに。それで、どなたをお誘いに？
String.Dest: As you will it. Wo shall we invite?

String.Source: それは素晴らしい考えだ！誰がその幸せ者なんだ？
String.Dest: That's an excellent idea? Who's going to be the lucky one then?

String.Source: すごいことを言い出すな。いいさ、誰を誘う？
String.Dest: You say some outrageous things. Alright, who are we inviting?

String.Source: それは・・・わかったわかった。誰を誘うんだ？
String.Dest: That's... alright, alright. Who are we inviting?

String.Source: そういうのも嫌いじゃない。誰を誘うんだ？
String.Dest: I don't dislike that sort of thing. Who are going to invite?

String.Source: おいおい、身体がますます熱くなるぞ。誰を誘うんだ？
String.Dest: Woah, woah, and I'm already almost at my limit. Who are inviting?

String.Source: ちょっと恥ずかしいけど・・・誰を誘うの？
String.Dest: That's a bit embarassing... who are you going to invite?

String.Source: それはちょっと・・・わかったわ、誰を誘うの？
String.Dest: That's a bit... I understand, who will you be inviting?

String.Source: 私だけでは不満ですか。どうぞお好きな人に声をかけてください
String.Dest: I'm not enough for you then, I see. Very well, take along whoever you like.

String.Source: 随分と自信家なのね。いいわ、誰を誘うの？
String.Dest: You're quite confident, aren't you. Very well, who will you invite along?

String.Source: おぞましくも魅力的な提案ですわね。誰を誘うんですの？
String.Dest: That is an obscene, yet fascinating proposal. Who will you invite along?

String.Source: すごいことを言い出すな。いいさ、誰を誘う？
String.Dest: You say some outrageous things. Alright, who are we inviting?

String.Source: ちょっと恥ずかしいけど・・・誰を誘うの？
String.Dest: That's a bit embarassing... who are you going to invite?

String.Source: (...は小首をかしげている。ついてくるようだ)
String.Dest: (... tilts their head. They will follow, it seems.)

String.Source: どうしました？やはり、ふたりでいたしますか？
String.Dest: Is something the matter? Shall it be just the two of us after all?

String.Source: まだですの？どうせなら、ふたりきりで・・・？
String.Dest: Are you still not finished? Wouldn't you rather have it be just the two of us...?

String.Source: ねえ、待ちきれないの。何なら、ふたりでもいいわよ？
String.Dest: I can't wait anymore. Let's do it with just the two of us, all right?

String.Source: どうしました？なんなら、ふたりでしても一向に構いませんよ
String.Dest: Is something wrong? I wouldn't it just being the two of us.

String.Source: どうするんだ？ふたりでしても構わないぞ？
String.Dest: What are you going to do? I don't care even if it's just the two of us.

String.Source: どうした？やっぱりふたりでするか？
String.Dest: What is it? Just us two after all?

String.Source: どうしたの？やっぱりふたりでする？
String.Dest: What's wrong? Will it be just us two after all?

String.Source: (...は焦れったそうにしている。今にもとびかかってきそうだ)
String.Dest: (... seems irritated. They might leap at you at any minute.)

String.Source: かしこまりました。一緒にお相手させていただきます
String.Dest: I understand. Let me also keep you company.

String.Source: 私も加えてくださるのですか。光栄です、従士
String.Dest: Will you take me as well? I'm honored, Thane.

String.Source: 私も加えてくださるのですか？光栄です、従士様
String.Dest: Will you take me as well? I'm honored, Thane

String.Source: すまないな、お前がかすんでしまうかもしれないぞ？
String.Dest: Sure, I hope you won't be overshadowed.

String.Source: それは素晴らしい提案だ、友よ
String.Dest: That's a wonderful idea, my friend.

String.Source: 誘ってくれてありがとう。付き合うよ
String.Dest: Thank you for inviting me. I will come with you.

String.Source: ひとりじゃ足りないのか？仕方がないな
String.Dest: Is one not enough for you? No choice about it, then.

String.Source: まあ、たまには変わった趣向も必要だな。付き合おう
String.Dest: I might enjoy doing something unusual once in a while. I'll accompany you.

String.Source: わかったわかった。そんな目で見ないでくれ
String.Dest: All right, All right. Stop making those eyes at me.

String.Source: ちょっとしたお仕置きだな。ぜひ加えてくれ
String.Dest: A little bit of punishment, eh? Count me in.

String.Source: ひとりで満足できないなんて、随分と欲張りだな
String.Dest: Are you not satisfied with one alone? You seem quite greedy.

String.Source: 主役が交代するがいいのか？・・・冗談だよ、楽しもう
String.Dest: Do you want to switch places then? ...Just kidding. Let's have fun.

String.Source: 断るのは難しいな。いいぞ、一緒に楽しもう
String.Dest: I have a hard time turning this down. Very well, let us enjoy each other.

String.Source: 私も一緒に？ちょっと、ドキドキするわね
String.Dest: You want me as well? I admit, I am a bit excited.

String.Source: 別にいいけど、ちゃんと平等に扱ってよ
String.Dest: I don't mind, but treat us both equally.

String.Source: まあ・・・たまには気分転換も必要かもね
String.Dest: Well... I might need a change of pace like this once in a while.

String.Source: ふふ、まとめて楽しもうだなんて、ずいぶんと贅沢ね
String.Dest: Fufu, having us all enjoying ourselves seems quite extravagant to me.

String.Source: 仕方ない人ですね。まあ、そこまで言うのなら・・・
String.Dest: You really are hopeless. Well, if you insist.-

String.Source: わかりました。あなたの顔をたててあげましょう
String.Dest: I understand. I will defer to you.

String.Source: ひとりじゃ相手できないの？いいわ、助けてあげる
String.Dest: Are you alone not enough? Very well, I'll help you.

String.Source: ふふ、全員を満足させられるんでしょうね？
String.Dest: Fufu, can you satisy us all?

String.Source: わかりましたわ。一緒に搾り取ってさしあげましょう
String.Dest: I understand. Let's squeeze him dry together.

String.Source: いいですわ、私たちが搾り取ってさしあげます
String.Dest: Very well, we'll squeeze you dry.

String.Source: 誘ってくれてありがとう。付き合うよ
String.Dest: Thank you for inviting me. I will come with you.

String.Source: ひとりじゃ足りないのか？仕方がないな
String.Dest: Is one not enough for you? No choice about it, then.

String.Source: 私も一緒に？ちょっと、ドキドキするわね
String.Dest: You want me as well? I admit, I am a bit excited.

String.Source: 別にいいけど、ちゃんと平等に扱ってよ
String.Dest: I don't mind, but treat us both equally.

String.Source: (...は喜びを表現している。伝わったようだ)
String.Dest: (... looks pleased. They seem to understand your intent.)

String.Source: どうかなさいましたか？
String.Dest: Is something wrong?

String.Source: どうかなさいまして？
String.Dest: Is something the matter?

String.Source: 何？
String.Dest: What is it?

String.Source: 何だ？
String.Dest: What is it?

String.Source: どうかしましたか？
String.Dest: Is something wrong?

String.Source: どうした？
String.Dest: What's the matter?

String.Source: どうしたの？
String.Dest: What's the matter?

String.Source: (...は小首をかしげている)
String.Dest: (... is tilting their head.)
